reviewText: Chocky is the first part of a classic sci-fi trilogy from the 80's which includes "Chocky's Children" and "Chocky's Challenge". Adapted from the John Wyndham novel, parents of schoolboy Matthew Gore are beginning to notice a change in their son. His schoolwork has dramatically improved and he's developed many new talents. The secret lies with Chocky, a friendly and inquisitive alien that has entered his mind in order to learn about earth. But before long Matthew's new skills begin to attract some dangerous attention...Great series if you love sci-fi!
